mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO category(`level`, `name`) VALUES
(1, #{name})

INSERT INTO food(food_name, food_image, category, com_score, comments, great_com, good_com, notbad_com, food_makes, author, summary, material, food_make_way, tips) VALUES (#{foodName}, #{foodImage}, #{category}, #{comScore}, #{comments}, #{greatCom}, #{goodCom}, #{notBadCom}, #{foodMakes}, #{author}, #{summary}, #{material}, #{foodMakeWay}, #{tips})
